title: where is the account transfer button in the store?
body:
where is the account transfer button in the store?
i want to change from NA to OCE

the FAQs only gives info on how to pay and the benefits, but never indicated where the actual button is.
I had been searching for hours, please help!

replies.body:
Server transfers are down right now. At the end of November they estimated it would be another 5/6 weeks before they could fix it. You can keep updated [HERE](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)

When it is up, it will be located under store>account.
Its 01/12 and still not working?? Dont u know its gonna be ready, please? :)
